document.full_text: a post-trial hearing in san francisco for barry bonds's federal perjury case was postponed from friday to june 17, giving prosecutors more time to decide if they will retry any of the three counts in which the jury deadlocked.
document.title: prosecutors get delay in bonds hearing
lines_and_colors: a post-trial hearing in san francisco for barry bonds's federal perjury case was postponed from friday to june 17, giving prosecutors more time to decide if they will retry any of the three counts in which the jury deadlocked.
